name: Garlic–Herb Chicken
description: Tender chicken roasted with garlic, a delicate mix of herbs, and soft, fresh vegetables. Each piece is juicy and flavorful, offering a warm, comforting taste with savory notes balanced by the gentle richness of butter. The carrots and broccoli provide a subtle sweetness, while the herbs enhance the aroma, making every bite satisfying and aromatic.

name: Crispy Garden Salad
description: Fresh, crisp greens tossed with juicy cucumbers, ripe tomatoes, and a delicate, mellow vinaigrette. Each bite offers a harmonious blend of textures and flavors, combining the subtle crunch of vegetables with the gentle herbal aroma of a carefully selected herb mix. Light and refreshing, this salad is perfectly balanced with a hint of olive oil, a touch of salt and pepper, and leaves a clean, invigorating finish on the palate.

name: Four Cheese Pizza
description: A soft, golden crust generously layered with a creamy, harmonious blend of mozzarella, cheddar, parmesan, and cream cheese, enhanced with a delicate sprinkle of light herbs. Each slice offers a warm, comforting bite with rich, melty textures and a subtle, savory aroma. Finished with a gentle golden top and a touch of tomato sauce, this pizza delivers a perfectly balanced combination of flavors that is indulgent yet satisfying.

name: Caramel Cream Tart
description: A luscious caramel cream tart resting on a tender, buttery crust, lightly toasted to perfection. The sweet, velvety filling melds with gentle notes of butter and sugar, creating a rich yet balanced flavor. Each bite offers a smooth, silky texture with a subtle caramel aroma, delivering a comforting and indulgent dessert experience that is both satisfying and elegantly sweet.

name: Mint Lemon Tea
description: A soothing mint lemon tea, carefully brewed to combine the bright, zesty aroma of fresh lemon with the gentle, refreshing sweetness of mint leaves. Each sip delivers a warm, comforting sensation while subtly awakening the senses. Enhanced with a touch of honey, this drink balances citrus tang and herbal freshness, making it an invigorating yet calming beverage perfect for relaxing moments or a gentle pick-me-up.

name: Beef Stroganoff
description: Tender strips of beef gently simmered in a rich, creamy mushroom sauce with sautéed onions. This hearty, savory dish delivers deep, comforting flavors with a subtle buttery aroma and velvety texture. Each bite combines the richness of cream and the earthy notes of mushrooms, creating a warm, satisfying meal that evokes classic home-cooked comfort while maintaining a delicate, balanced taste profile.

name: Grilled Salmon
description: A succulent salmon fillet perfectly grilled with fresh lemon and aromatic dill. Light and flavorful, each bite offers a delicate balance of citrus brightness and herbal notes, complemented by a subtle olive oil richness. This dish delivers a fresh, wholesome experience, with tender, flaky salmon that is both satisfying and elegant, making it a delightful choice for a refined yet comforting meal.

name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
description: A vibrant medley of fresh seasonal vegetables, lightly stir-fried in savory soy sauce and aromatic sesame oil. Crisp carrots, tender broccoli, and sweet bell peppers are combined with a hint of garlic, creating a colorful, flavorful dish. Balanced, wholesome, and satisfying, each bite delivers a perfect harmony of textures and natural vegetable sweetness, making it a healthy and delicious choice for a light yet nourishing meal.

name: Roast Duck
description: Succulent duck, slow-roasted to perfection with golden, crispy skin and a rich, savory flavor. Infused with aromatic herbs and a touch of garlic, each bite delivers a perfectly balanced taste. Served with a subtle buttery finish, this dish combines indulgent texture and deep, comforting flavors, making it a sophisticated and satisfying main course that delights the senses and warms the palate.

name: Stuffed Bell Peppers
description: Bell peppers filled with rice, minced meat, and herbs. Soft, savory, and hearty.

name: Pasta Carbonara
description: Classic Italian pasta with creamy sauce, pancetta, and parmesan. Rich and comforting.

name: Chicken Curry
description: Tender chicken simmered in spiced curry sauce. Warm, aromatic, and flavorful.

name: Lamb Chops
description: Juicy lamb chops grilled with rosemary and garlic. Bold, savory, and aromatic.

name: Vegetable Lasagna
description: Layers of pasta, vegetables, and creamy sauce baked to perfection. Comforting and hearty.

name: Shrimp Risotto
description: Creamy risotto with fresh shrimp and herbs. Elegant, savory, and smooth.

name: BBQ Ribs
description: Slow-cooked pork ribs glazed with smoky BBQ sauce. Tender, juicy, and bold.

name: Falafel Plate
description: Crispy chickpea falafel served with hummus and pita. Nutty, earthy, and satisfying.

name: Stuffed Eggplant
description: Eggplant baked with minced meat, rice, and tomato sauce. Soft, savory, and rich.

name: Seafood Paella
description: Spanish rice dish with shrimp, mussels, and saffron. Vibrant, aromatic, and festive.

name: Turkey Meatballs
description: Juicy turkey meatballs simmered in tomato sauce. Light, savory, and comforting.

name: Stuffed Cabbage Rolls
description: Cabbage leaves filled with rice and minced meat, simmered in tomato sauce. Traditional and hearty.

name: Teriyaki Chicken
description: Grilled chicken glazed with sweet teriyaki sauce. Balanced, savory-sweet, and aromatic.

name: Moussaka
description: Greek layered dish with eggplant, minced lamb, and creamy béchamel. Rich, savory, and comforting.

name: Stuffed Zucchini Boats
description: Zucchini halves filled with rice, vegetables, and cheese. Light, fresh, and savory.

name: Pork Schnitzel
description: Crispy breaded pork cutlet fried golden. Crunchy outside, tender inside.

name: Vegetable Curry
description: Mixed vegetables simmered in spiced curry sauce with coconut milk. Warm, aromatic, and vegan-friendly.

name: Stuffed Mushrooms
description: Large mushrooms filled with cheese, herbs, and breadcrumbs. Savory, earthy, and aromatic.

name: Greek Village Salad
description: Classic mix of tomatoes, cucumbers, olives, and feta with olive oil. Bright, tangy, and refreshing.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Crisp romaine lettuce with parmesan, croutons, and creamy Caesar dressing. Savory and crunchy.

name: Caprese Salad
description: Fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil drizzled with olive oil. Simple, elegant, and aromatic.

name: Quinoa Power Salad
description: Nutty quinoa with fresh greens, avocado, and lemon dressing. Light, energizing, and wholesome.

name: Beetroot Goat Cheese Salad
description: Roasted beetroot paired with creamy goat cheese and walnuts. Sweet, earthy, and nutty.

name: Asian Sesame Salad
description: Cabbage, carrots, and sesame seeds tossed in soy-ginger dressing. Crisp, tangy, and aromatic.

name: Avocado & Mango Salad
description: Creamy avocado with sweet mango and lime dressing. Tropical, fresh, and vibrant.

name: Spinach Strawberry Salad
description: Fresh spinach leaves with sweet strawberries and balsamic glaze. Sweet, tangy, and refreshing.

name: Margherita Pizza
description: Classic Italian pizza with tomato sauce, mozzarella, and fresh basil. Simple, fresh, and aromatic.

name: Pepperoni Pizza
description: Savory pepperoni layered over mozzarella and tomato sauce. Bold, spicy, and comforting.

name: Supreme
description: Loaded with bell peppers, onions, mushrooms, and olives. Colorful, hearty, and meat-free.

name: BBQ Chicken Pizza
description: Tender chicken pieces with smoky BBQ sauce and mozzarella. Sweet, savory, and bold.

name: Garden Pizza
description: Tomato base topped with zucchini, mushrooms, peppers, and cheese. Fresh, light, and plant-based.

name: Hawaiian Pizza
description: Sweet pineapple paired with ham and mozzarella. Tropical, savory-sweet, and comforting.

name: Spinach & Ricotta Pizza
description: Creamy ricotta with fresh spinach and mozzarella. Mild, creamy, and friendly.

name: Meat Lovers Pizza
description: Packed with pepperoni, sausage, ham, and bacon. Hearty, savory, and indulgent.

name: Mediterranean Pizza
description: Tomato base with olives, artichokes, spinach, and cheese. Earthy, tangy, and plant-based.

name: Mushroom & Truffle Pizza
description: Rich mushrooms with truffle oil and mozzarella. Earthy, aromatic, and friendly.

name: Buffalo Chicken Pizza
description: Spicy buffalo chicken with mozzarella and ranch drizzle. Bold, tangy, and satisfying.

name: Chocolate Lava Cake
description: Rich chocolate cake with a molten center. Warm, indulgent, and decadent.

name: Strawberry Cheesecake
description: Creamy cheesecake topped with fresh strawberries and glaze. Sweet, smooth, and fruity.

name: Tiramisu
description: Layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers with mascarpone cream. Elegant, smooth, and aromatic.

name: Matcha Cheesecake
description: Creamy cheesecake infused with matcha green tea. Smooth, earthy, and modern.

name: Baklava
description: Layers of flaky pastry filled with nuts and honey syrup. Sweet, crunchy, and aromatic.

name: Mango Mousse
description: Light mousse made with ripe mangoes and cream. Tropical, airy, and refreshing.

name: Panna Cotta
description: Silky Italian cream dessert with vanilla and berry coulis. Smooth, delicate, and elegant.

name: Fresh Orange Juice
description: Bright, tangy juice squeezed from ripe oranges. Refreshing and full of vitamin C.

name: Apple Juice
description: Sweet, crisp juice pressed from fresh apples. Smooth and naturally refreshing.

name: Carrot–Ginger Juice
description: Earthy carrots blended with zesty ginger. Energizing and slightly spicy.

name: Pomegranate Juice
description: Deep ruby juice with tart-sweet flavor. Rich in antioxidants and refreshing.

name: Tropical Mix Juice
description: Blend of pineapple, mango, and passionfruit. Sweet, exotic, and vibrant.

name: Beetroot–Apple Juice
description: Earthy beetroot balanced with sweet apple. Nutritious, bold, and refreshing.

name: Jasmine Green Tea
description: Delicate green tea infused with jasmine blossoms. Floral, soothing, and light.

name: Earl Grey Black Tea
description: Bold black tea scented with bergamot. Aromatic, smooth, and classic.

name: Chamomile Herbal Tea
description: Gentle chamomile flowers steeped for a calming infusion. Soft, floral, and relaxing.

name: Hibiscus Iced Tea
description: Tangy hibiscus petals brewed and chilled. Bright, refreshing, and slightly tart.

name: Espresso
description: Strong, concentrated coffee shot. Bold, intense, and aromatic.

name: Cappuccino
description: Espresso topped with steamed milk and foam. Creamy, balanced, and comforting.

name: Latte
description: Smooth espresso blended with steamed milk. Mild, creamy, and versatile.

name: Iced Coffee
description: Chilled espresso poured over ice with milk. Refreshing, bold, and smooth.

name: Cabernet Sauvignon Wine
description: Full-bodied red wine with dark fruit notes. Smooth, bold, and elegant.

name: White Wine (Chardonnay)
description: Crisp white wine with citrus and oak notes. Light, refreshing, and smooth.

name: Sparkling Wine (Prosecco)
description: Effervescent sparkling wine with fruity notes. Festive, crisp, and lively.

name: Beer
description: Golden lager with crisp, clean flavor. Refreshing and easy-drinking.

name: Craft IPA
description: Hoppy craft beer with citrus and pine notes. Bold, bitter, and aromatic.

name: Mojito
description: Refreshing cocktail with rum, mint, lime, and soda. Sweet, tangy, and cooling.

name: Margarita
description: Classic tequila cocktail with lime and triple sec. Zesty, bold, and refreshing.

name: Whiskey Sour
description: Smooth whiskey shaken with lemon juice and sugar. Tangy, bold, and balanced.

name: Gin & Tonic
description: Crisp gin mixed with tonic water and lime. Refreshing, light, and aromatic.

name: Rum Punch
description: Tropical cocktail with rum, fruit juices, and grenadine. Sweet, fruity, and festive.
